detaileddescription.para: This constructs a main window, and generates the actions, menus and toolbars needed.

xrefdescription.para: This class also loads the default highlight mode, shuold be move to another class?
Do we need to modify the title of the main window?

briefdescription.para: move the focus to the next tab (SLOT)

detaileddescription.para: This slot is called when the user presses the ALT+right keyboard combination (alt+left on RTL desktops). This function does the job of selecting the needed tab number.

briefdescription.para: move the focus to the previous tab (SLOT)

detaileddescription.para: This slot is called when the user presses the ALT+left keyboard combination (alt+right on RTL desktops) This function does the job of selecting the needed tab number.

briefdescription.para: set the focus on the editor (SLOT)

detaileddescription.para: This function restores the focus to the current editor, to the editor in the mainTab.

briefdescription.para: Called when the window is been closed.

detaileddescription.para: This function is called when the main window is about to be closed. We use this to save the status of the application.

simplesect.para: This function changes the value of the event passed because otherwise, gcc complains and issues a warning.

briefdescription.para: The main window of the application.

detaileddescription.para: This is the main window seen on screen. When this window is closed, this means the application has been terminated.
